thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 3 of 116
thread.title: David Dod

author: David Dod
title: David Dod
text: My experience has been that ezcater goes "out of the way" to make sure that the company you have chosen to cater your event is confirmed, on time, and is the right order. If a problem ever does arise- you can count on the service department to hold your hand and take care of you the whole way by recommending something similar and then ensuring it is delivered to the right person on time as well. I've had an issue come up at 10pm on a Sunday and couldn't believe the online service, it's courtesy, and promptness. I can't say enough about ezcater and recommend them without reservation.
